item.author: Fluxflashor
item.title: Popular Decks of the Week for September 18
item.description:
The calculations are in and the most popular Standard decks from the past week are ready for you to take to the ladder.

What are you going to play this week?

item.author: Fluxflashor
item.title: Paid BattleTag Name Changes Now Available for $10 USD
item.description: Players on Battle.net have been asking for a paid BattleTag change service since the early days of BattleTags, and it's finally here.

item.author: Fluxflashor
item.title: Value Town #87 - BatStone, Tyrande, Arena Changes, Current State of Hearthstone
item.description: This week on Value Town, ChanManV, Noxious, Firebat, and Reynad discussed BatStone, today's patch, and the current state of the game.

item.author: Fluxflashor
item.title: HearthPwn Card Design Competition Season 4 - A Shocking Revelation!
item.description: Our tenth card design competition of season 4, A Shocking Relevation, has begun! This week we're designing cards which reveal cards from hands or decks, but not in the way of the jouster.

item.author: Fluxflashor
item.title: Hearthstone Patch 14406 - Welcome Bundle Arrives, Tyrande Priest Hero, New Card Backs, World Events
item.description: A new patch has arrived with the Welcome Bundle, a brand new Priest Hero - Tyrande Whisperwind, Card Backs, and More!

item.author: jmxd
item.title: BlizzConÂ® 2016 in-game goodies announced!
item.description: Blizzard just revealed the in-game items you'll be receiving for attending BlizzCon this year or by purchasing the virtual ticket! For Hearthstone you'll once again be able to unlock a unique cardback.

item.author: Fluxflashor
item.title: Top 10 Chinese Decks From the Hearthstone China Autumn Championships
item.description: Why hello there Yogg & N'Zoth, how do you do? We've got the top 10 decks from the recent Hearthstone China Autumn Championships and you should totally check them out.

item.author: Fluxflashor
item.title: Hearthstone Americas Summer Championships 2016 Decklists
item.description: Decklists from the upcoming Americas Summer Championships are here! Come see what the top eight competitors in the Americas region will be playing this weekend.

item.author: Fluxflashor
item.title: Top 3 is this Week's Tavern Brawl!
item.description: This week's brawl involves decks built with a composition of only 3 different cards! What are your top 3?
